name: h2ssscam
summary: Synthetic H2 fluorescence code refactored by Cole Meyer, Daniel Lopez-Sanders, Cassandra S. Cruz, Dominik P. Pacholski during Code/Astro 2025. The code is based on  ''Empirically estimated far-UV extinction curves for classical T Tauri stars'', McJunkin, M., France, K., Schindhelm, R., Herczeg, G., Schneider, P. C., & Brown, A. (2016), ApJ, 828, 69.
